title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel of manners centered on the relationship between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy in Regency-era England

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel about totalitarianism, mass surveillance and repressive regimentation in a totalitarian future society

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about racial injustice in the American South through the eyes of young Scout Finch and her father Atticus
keywords: racism, justice, childhood, Alabama, Atticus Finch, Scout, moral courage

author: Charles Dickens
description: Set in London and Paris before and during the French Revolution, exploring themes of resurrection and sacrifice

title: The Little Prince
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

author: Paulo Coelho
awards: Grinzane Cavour Book Award, Hans Christian Andersen Award

author: Lewis Carroll

author: Dan Brown
